smart_invitations.pain_point: Scattered tools, no system, inconsistent income
smart_invitations.invitation_message:
Hey! I noticed you're building something cool but seem stretched thin.

I put together a system that helped me go from chaos to consistent income in 30 days.

It includes:
→ Ready-to-use templates (no more starting from scratch)
→ A tracking dashboard (see all your income in one place)
→ A step-by-step playbook (know exactly what to do daily)

Would it help if I shared the starter kit? It's what I wish I had when I started.
